snippet: With John Compton leaving, the company promoted Zein Abdalla, the chief executive of PepsiCo’s European operations.
abstract: PepsiCo promotes Zein Abdalla, chief executive of European operations, to replace president John Compton, who is stepping down after less than a year on the job to run a large privately held company in his home state of Tennessee.
lead_paragraph: With John Compton leaving, the company promoted Zein Abdalla, the chief executive of PepsiCo’s European operations.

headline.main: President of PepsiCo Resigns to Become a Chief Elsewhere
headline.print_headline: President of PepsiCo Resigns to Become a Chief Elsewhere
